mapper.sql:
select *, (select count(*) as club_member_cnt from club_member cm where club_id = c.club_id),
(select count(*) as count from club c where true )
(select count(*) from club c)
from club c
mapper.select: select * from club c join club_member cm on c.club_id = cm.club_id left join club_board cb on cm.club_id = cb.club_id where cm.user_id = #{user_id}

select *, (select count(*) from club_board cb where cb.club_id = #{club_id}) from club c left join club_board cb on c.club_id = cb.club_id where c.club_id = #{club_id} limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.club (club_title, club_create_time, club_info, club_master_id) VALUES(#{club_title}, now(), #{club_info}, #{club_master_id})
INSERT INTO public.club_board_comment (club_comment, club_comment_time, user_id, club_article_id) VALUES(#{club_comment}, now(), #{user_id}, #{club_article_id})

INSERT INTO public.club_board (club_article_title, club_article_content, club_board_upload_time, club_article_viewcnt, club_id, user_id) VALUES(#{club_article_title}, #{club_article_content}, now(), 0, #{club_id}, #{user_id})
